page.title: 04Services.
page.content: Fire station. Dufftown Fire Station has been in existence since 1968.It is a 1 pump station.It has 11 part_time firemen employed by Grampian Regional Council. There are 6 men in a crew at a fire: 1driver,1 officer and 4 firemen.The firestation is situated at the bottom of York Street.The most common type of fire occurring in Dufftown are chimney fires.They seldom have any fatal fires. Police station. The police station is situated at the bottom of York Street opposite the Fire statiion.There are 2 policemen resident in Dufftown.
